import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import '../Style/Work.scss'; export default ({ backgroundColor, fontColor, Index, Title, Date, Tech, demoLink, githubLink, Description, Images }) => { const [ active, setActive ] = useState('') useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setActive('--active'); }, 300) console.log('Work page UseEffect') }, []); return (
